name: settlelah
description: SettleLah - A bill splitting application with enhanced security

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.build:js: terser public/script.js -o public/script.min.js --compress --mangle && terser public/result.js -o public/result.min.js --compress --mangle && terser public/login.js -o public/login.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build:css: cleancss public/styles.css -o public/styles.min.css && cleancss public/result.css -o public/result.min.css && cleancss public/login.css -o public/login.min.css

author: Joel Lee
